languages.text: {n}Рыжеволосый пожимает плечами.{/n} "А я тебя и не приглашал присоединиться к трапезе".
{n}The red-haired warrior shrugs.{/n} "I did not invite you to join my repast."
languages.original_text: {n}Рыжеволосый пожимает плечами.{/n} "А я тебя и не приглашал присоединиться к трапезе".

languages.text: {n}这位红发战士耸了耸肩。{/n}“我又没邀请你参加我的盛宴。”
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior shrugs.{/n} "I did not invite you to join my repast."

languages.text: {n}赤髪の戦士は肩をすくめた。{/n}「人の食事中に邪魔してきたのはあんたのほうだろ」
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior shrugs.{/n} "I did not invite you to join my repast."

traits.locale_text: {n}赤髪の戦士は肩をすくめた。{/n}「人の食事中に邪魔してきたのはあんたのほうだろ」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}El guerrero pelirrojo.{/n} «Tampoco le había invitado a compartir mi comida».
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior shrugs.{/n} "I did not invite you to join my repast."

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero pelirrojo.{/n} «Tampoco le había invitado a compartir mi comida».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier roux se contente de hausser les épaules.{/n} « Je ne vous ai pas {mf|invité|invitée} à partager mon repas. »
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior shrugs.{/n} "I did not invite you to join my repast."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier roux se contente de hausser les épaules.{/n} « Je ne vous ai pas {mf|invité|invitée} à partager mon repas. »

languages.text: {n}Der rothaarige Krieger zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich habe Euch nicht eingeladen, an meiner Mahlzeit teilzuhaben."
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior shrugs.{/n} "I did not invite you to join my repast."

languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior shrugs.{/n} "I did not invite you to join my repast."

languages.text: {n}Kızıl saçlı savaşçı, omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Yemeğimi paylaşmayı teklif etmedim."
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior shrugs.{/n} "I did not invite you to join my repast."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızıl saçlı savaşçı omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Seni yemeğime ortak olmaya çağırmadım."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
